titleStmt.title: The oyle of gladnesse. Or, Comfort for dejected sinners First preached in the parish church of Banbury in certaine sermons, and now published in this present treatise. By William Whately minister there.
titleStmt.author: Whately, William, 1583-1639.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. M[iller] for George Edwards, and are to be sold at his house in Greene-Arbour, at the signe of the Angell,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
